storyInfo: Theresa sees everything in the Doctor's memories, and finally completes her farewell to that particular person.

attributes.content: Erasing memories. This is something Theresa actually lacks experience in.
Not to mention she now faces a rare kind of mind.
She knows not what she will see, and has no clue if it will be dangerous. But there is no room to retreat.
She has made the final decision of her life.
She walks into the Doctor's memories, and cuts them up into countless fragments of dissipating threads.
Memory fades away in silence.
She walks through a world she has never seen and could never understand.
How did such a glorious civilization meet its end?
How do geniuses as bright as shooting stars struggle for a solution to their ultimate problem, yet find nothing?
Is resistance futile? Is unity a mere fantasy?
Is Terra's future already set in stone? What of her beloved homeland?
What of her loved ones?
She has no answer. She cannot find the answer.
She can only continue meandering in the void of memories gone.
Finally, she sees someone familiar.
Is all their enthusiasm overwhelming you?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What brings you here, Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Should I not be present at this celebration of your latest victory?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's been a long time since I last... days like these were rare back then, you know.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Or I should say, I've grown so unaccustomed to it now.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: No matter, you will get used to it again, in time. Babel will be a new beginning.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Go. We should enjoy this celebration.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Theresa watches Kal'tsit pat the Doctor before gently pushing that very back into the waiting crowd.
Too many are forcing their way through the throng, hands stretched out, fighting each other to be the first to shake the Doctor's hand, or pat the Doctor's shoulder.
Some taller and gutsier ones even try to put their hands right on the Doctor's head for a good kneading.
Uh, sorry about that unruly subordinate of mine, Doctor. I wanted to stop him...
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: But my arm's injured... so I couldn't make it in time.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: It's fine... how's your arm?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Recovery's going pretty well.
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: It's a pity you won't get to enjoy many drinks here tonight.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: That's alright, Doctor. I'll have a few more pints on this guy's behalf.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: We might have gotten ourselves stuck in that encirclement, had you not sprung that surprise attack at the end.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: C'mon, let's slam a few glasses to honor the Doctor!
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: I'm afraid my alcohol tolerance may disappoint you, Ace.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Excuuuuse—me,—make—way please... I have to see the protagonist of the day!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: So many people in here! This is the first time I feel that the command center is too small... do you want me to widen it later? There's still so many people outside hurrying in here with snacks and drinks.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Doctor, everyone's cheering for the victory you've brought us, but you seem a little... uneasy.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I thought I was masking it pretty well. *ahem* I'm just a little nervous in crowds.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Hey, careful. That's enough pushing. Amiya, you good?
attributes.name: Scout

attributes.content: I'm okay!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor! Come with me, Theresa and I made you a cake!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Look, the oven was so hot I got a blister on my finger.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Thank you... Oh! Are you okay? Does anyone have some burn cream...?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: A gentle cough sounds in the room, and the crowd splits into two.
Theresa sees a woman dressed in white passing by, smiling as she extends a hand to the Doctor with a still healing needle wound.
She is looking at herself.
The joy fades away, as do the memories and voices.
Theresa erases the memory she is too familiar with, and continues forward.
She sees a record she has never seen before within PRTS.
Invoke imaging capabilities. Enable administrator-level encryption.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Image number <color=#FF4200>(0091_admin)</color>...... Add subject: <color=#FF4200>(This is for you)</color>.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Activating recorder... Beginning video record.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: If I didn't hold on until you woke up, you'll see this video.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I will remain here, in the safest of places until everything settles.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Once I'm done with everything, I'll vanish into silence...
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Disappearing before all those who hate me.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: There is always a voice inside me, reminding me, asking me—'Who am I?'
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Our own watcher? Or a traitor to future civilizations?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I can no longer recognize myself—
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: You'll get an answer after checking all the logs I left behind. But for now at least, I'll no longer hesitate to do what I should do.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: When you wake up, I will have already disappeared in your past, and also unable to appear in our promised future.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: That's why I hope...
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: ...Pause recording. Delete all previous content. I... still need a bit more time.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: She does not pause or sigh, just continues what she ought to do in silence.
Theresa goes deeper into the buried memories.
I need you to contact the closest rescue team! The wrecked transport has a Rim Billiton logo on it, this is your squad...
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I hear someone still alive in there!
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: *bzzt* We got your call, but it'll take some time for us to rush over from the nearest mining plate.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: Based on the information you gave us, there's been banditry at your location there before, so we'll also notify armed security to send a dispatch at once.
attributes.name: Comms

attributes.content: ...Armed security...? But with the way Rim Billiton treats Infected orphans...
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Hmph—
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Just hold on... I'll get you out of there myself...
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Please, stay with me... gah... that's a good girl, give me your hand.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Hold tight!
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: But... I'm so... tired...
What's your name—
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Name...?
Mum... calls me... Amiya...
Amiya, just hold on tight!
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I... I'm holding—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I won't let go—
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: The memory shatters.
This is Theresa's destination, the terminus of the Doctor's memory—
'Theresa...'
This is impossible. Every memory should have been...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: 'Theresa.'
She follows the voice to a void, and it speaks once more from behind the nothingness.
Where am I—
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You're finally here. I've been waiting for you.
Doctor...?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Doctor?
Not many people call me that. They prefer my team codename—'Oracle'.
...Oracle...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: So you're the one Kal'tsit believes in.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I've let her down terribly. But we had no choice, I'm entangled in an inescapable plot.
attributes.name: Oracle

attributes.content: I've been watching you from here as you went around nurturing your hopes, as you suffered betrayal—
attributes.name: Oracle

attributes.content: As if I was looking at my past self.
attributes.name: Oracle

attributes.content: ...I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You are only residue of the Doctor's burned away emotions. There's no way for me to preserve your emotions and memories in our current circumstances...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You've reached your destination, so just do what you have to do.
attributes.name: Oracle

attributes.content: Thank you for trusting me.
attributes.name: Oracle

attributes.content: It may be a little late for this... but I'm glad to meet you.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I'm glad to meet you too, Theresa.
attributes.name: Oracle

attributes.content: Oracle walks into the distance of the endless wheat fields, disappearing within the stalks.
A draft of wind tears through the plain with a roar, and the final scene disperses until only the end of a thread is left.
Theresa holds the strand. It quickly loses its luster, and turns into powdery dust.
It's time to say goodbye...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: We'll meet again in the future, won't we...?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Kal'tsit... Amiya...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: ......{@nickname}.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Theresa lets go of the final strand of thread in her hand, and watches it disperse and fade away like starlight.
She takes a step forward, towards hope...
Towards death.
